text: Tony Vitello (born October 9, 1978) is an American college baseball coach and former infielder. He is the head baseball coach at the University of Tennessee. Vitello played college baseball at the University of Missouri from 2001 to 2002 under head coach Tim Jamieson. He was announced as the new Tennessee coach on June 7, 2017. ==Head coaching record== ==See also== *List of current NCAA Division I baseball coaches ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Arkansas Razorbacks baseball coaches Category:Missouri Tigers baseball coaches Category:Missouri Tigers baseball players Category:TCU Horned Frogs baseball coaches Category:Tennessee Volunteers baseball coaches
title: Tony Vitello
